課上講的内容和考試的内容難度完全不是一個等級的，課上只講概念，考試卻有很多分析題。

Students kept coming too late to class which was very disrupting, the professor should have talked to people that repeatedly came too late. Furthermore, the group work is hard if group members don't participate, put less focus on that.
